snippet.title: Transient - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to PC, PS4 and Xbox One in 2020. Wishlist on Steam now: http://bit.ly/2QyCutN
H.P. Lovecraft meets Cyberpunk. Delve deep into an obscure dystopian world and hold firm to your consciousness, when you stumble upon the terrifying truth about your life in a domed city, a truth that might tear apart your own sanity and question your very existence.

Keep up to date with Transient and Iceberg Interactive: 

Facebook: 
https://www.facebook.com/transientgame 
https://www.facebook.com/iceberginteractive

Twitter: 
https://twitter.com/stormlingstd
https://www.twitter.com/iceberg_int  

Discord: https://discord.gg/iceberginteractive
Official Website: http://www.transientgame.com
Steam Publisher Page: http://bit.ly/IcebergOnSteam
